frontmatter.title: Visual Testing Handbook
frontmatter.overview: What is visual testing? Visual tests validate the appearance of rendered UI by capturing an image of it in a consistent browser environment. That image is compared to previous images (baselines) to detect visual changes. UIs are more complex, multi-state, and personalized than ever. Visual testing helps you ensure that your app looks right every release.
